section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
The European Federation of Building Societies is an association of credit and other institutions promoting and supporting housing finance. As Europe moves towards political and economic integration, the Federation 
1.    promotes the idea of home ownership, 
2.    represents the interests of its members in the European Community, 
3.    ensures that its members are kept informed about progress in European unification and about the measures taken to this end by bodies of the European Communities as well as  
4.    supports and intensifies mutual information and exchange of experiences among its members in the field of housing finance and housing policy.
